author: Ittai Sopher / WWL Louisiana
title: Solar storm to impact United States | wwltv.com
text: NEW ORLEANS ‚Äî Rare solar storms could impact technology in The United States and project the northern lights over unusual locations throughout the country Friday night, according to scientists. The flares are accompanied by coronal mass ejections which shoot plasma and magnetic field from the outer atmosphere of the sun. This phenomenon is rare and has historically caused brief navigation issues and power grid problems. "They label these things like they do hurricanes -- from one to five -- they're labeling this one a G4 Watch," WWL Louisiana Meteorologist Payton Malone said Friday. "The last time they issued a G4 Watch was 2005." The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration said they had been monitoring the flares since Wednesday morning when at least five flares appeared to have been directed toward Earth. The NOAA outlined on Thursday the impact these storms can have. "Geomagnetic storms can impact infrastructure in near-Earth orbit and on Earth's surface, potentially disrupting communications, the electric power grid, navigation, radio and satellite operations," NOAA said on Thursday. "Geomagnetic storms can also trigger spectacular displays of aurora on Earth." Louisiana will likely not see the aurora borealis lights. Although the National Weather Service has said that half the United States might be able to see the northern lights, including possibly Alabama and northern California. In addition, almost all of Canada will be placed within view of the aurora. The 2003 Halloween Storms in Sweden were cited by NOAA as a recent example of a solar storm having an impact on Earth. During that cycle, most of Sweden had a one-hour-long power outage.

author: Los Angeles Times - Kate Linthicum
title: This professor studies dictatorships. He helped convince Harvard to stand up to Trump | Flipboard
text:
This professor studies dictatorships. He helped convince Harvard to stand up to Trump CAMBRIDGE, Mass. ‚Äî In the days after Donald Trump‚Äôs reelection as president, Harvard political scientist Steven Levitsky was despondent. ‚ÄúI was in the fetal position,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI just wanted to put on sweat pants, eat ice cream and watch hockey.‚Äù Levitsky had spent two decades studying authoritarian ‚Ä¶
Los Angeles Times - Kate Linthicum ‚Ä¢ 48m

author: Neha B.
title: Grieving MƒÅori man couldn't make it to his grandma's funeral. So his American coworkers surprised him with haka
text: They also got him a bag of treats from a store in New Zealand and a card before surprising him with the gesture they had prepared for in secret. The coronavirus pandemic may have closed international borders, but it also united people in shared struggles. In 2021, a Maori man named [Jarom Ngakuru (@jaromngakuru)](https://www.tiktok.com/@jaromngakuru), who was working in the U.S., was devastated when he couldn‚Äôt attend his grandmother‚Äôs funeral in New Zealand. Seeing his grief, Ngakuru's American co-workers surprised him with a traditional Maori dance that moved him to tears, according to [Good Morning America](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aWmW01cM31g). Ngakuru, heartbroken at not being able to say goodbye to his grandmother, shared with Good Morning America: ‚ÄúIt was my nan, my mum‚Äôs mum. She passed away. I grew up with her. She is a big influence on my life. She was my last grandparent alive on Earth.‚Äù He added that in New Zealand when someone passes away, they bury them in the ground ‚Äúreally, really quick.‚Äù His grandmother was buried within just two days of her passing. ‚ÄúBy the time I would be able to fly back home, and make it from America, I was going to miss her funeral,‚Äù he said. View this post on Instagram He added that he couldn‚Äôt fly home even if he tried to, since New Zealand restricted people from flying in and out because of COVID. So, while he was struggling with utter grief, his co-workers came together to help him heal. ‚ÄúAnd they just said, ‚ÄòHey we‚Äôre here,‚Äô‚Äù Jarom recalled, ‚ÄúWe already know what‚Äôs happening. We got together a bunch of things for you.‚Äù He revealed that his friends got him a bag of treats from a little store in New Zealand, his hometown, along with a card that had a heartwarming message written on it. In addition to all that, they planned a thoughtful gesture by secretly learning the traditional Maori dance called ‚Äúhaka,‚Äù which is usually performed at significant events like weddings and funerals. The group was led by Jarom‚Äôs brother-in-law, Tongan, who also lives in America, and taught them the haka dance in just 24 hours. In May 2024, Jarom uploaded a short [TikTok clip](https://www.tiktok.com/@jaromngakuru/video/7372028383007411464) featuring their performance that brought tears to his eyes back in 2021. "The hardest part about living in America is that we live so far away. I couldn't make it home for my nan's funeral and I was broken! So my boys at work learned the haka without me knowing and brought home to me,‚Äù he wrote in the caption of the video. The clip shows the group of men passionately performing the traditional dance while vigorously slapping their chests and yelling chants in powerful voices. The tribe Ngapuhi, to which Jarom belongs, has its own style of performing haka, Jarom told Good Morning America. Describing his feelings after watching his coworkers perform the traditional dance, Jarom added, ‚ÄúThe emotion I felt was like love and passion. Like compassion towards them all.‚Äù [@jaromngakuru]Hardest part about living in america üá∫üá∏ is that we live so far away. I couldnt make it home for my nans funeral and i was BROKEN! so my boys at work learned the haka without me knowing and brought home to me üá≥üáøüè†[#haka][#grateful][#maori][#newzealand][#brothers][#fyp][#foryou][‚ô¨ original sound - Jarom Ngakuru] The video resonated with viewers from New Zealand to Florida, prompting heartwarming comments. ‚ÄúActually the best haka ove seen done by Americans,‚Äù commented [@kiwi_the_bro](https://www.tiktok.com/@kiwi_the_bro). While [@danisdailydose](https://www.tiktok.com/@danisdailydose) said, ‚ÄúThis shows how loved you are over in the States by your workmates. the effort and time they put in to learn and bring home to you. So cool bro!‚Äù Speaking to Good Morning America, Jarom admitted, ‚ÄúI obviously felt alone, having nobody around me in my family. And I was like, kind of, in my own little bubble,‚Äù he said, ‚ÄúBut they just showed support, and in a way that I was like, ‚ÄòWhoa, this is crazy!‚Äô I never saw it coming, but it helped me relieve a lot of stress, knowing that I have family here, even when I can‚Äôt be there.‚Äù

author: ExpressDigest
title: Brooke Shields pays sweet tribute to ‚Äòwonderful‚Äô lookalike daughter Grier on the model‚Äôs 18th birthday: ‚ÄòLove being your mom‚Äô
text:
Brooke Shields proved she is one proud mom as she celebrated her youngest daughter‚Äôs birthday.
The iconic actress, 58 ‚Äî who recently opened up about her difficult childhood ‚Äî took to her Instagram on Thursday to share adorable pics featuring her daughter, Grier, who is turning 18.
The beaming mother first posted a nostalgic photo capturing her planting a kiss on her then-toddler daughter‚Äôs cheek.
She also curated a collage featuring recent snapshots of Grier intertwined with glimpses of her childhood.
‚ÄòMy baby girl is 18! I love being your mom and seeing the wonderful woman you‚Äôre growing into.. Happy golden birthday, Grier! I love you!‚Äô Brooke wrote in her caption.
Brooke Shields proved she is one proud mom as she celebrated her youngest daughter Grier‚Äôs birthday
The iconic actress, 58, took to her Instagram on Thursday to share adorable pics featuring her youngest daughter, Grier, who is turning 18
The star shares Grier, along with daughter Rowan, 20, with her husband Chris Henchy.
Brooke and Chris welcomed Grier Hammond Henchy on April 18, 2006, in Los Angeles.
Following in her mother‚Äôs modeling path, Grier has recently stepped into the spotlight.
In May 2022, she made her debut in a Mother‚Äôs Day campaign for Victoria‚Äôs Secret alongside Brooke.
‚ÄòI asked her, and it was just such an emotionally beautiful period,‚Äô Brooke told People at the time.
‚ÄòYou know, I have resisted this. But to watch her handle herself in a way, it makes me realize, okay, she‚Äôs a pretty strong character.‚Äô
She continued: ‚ÄòSo I don‚Äôt feel like this business will eat her up. It was really fun to be in front of the camera with her.‚Äô
Meanwhile, the trailer for Brooke‚Äôs upcoming romantic comedy Mother of the Bride was recently released.
Brooke stars as Lana, a woman who travels to the Southeast Asian kingdom when her daughter announces she is getting married there in a month‚Äôs time to her boyfriend, played by Sean Teale.
The drama around the hasty nuptials is further complicated when Lana discovers her future son-in-law is the offspring of the man who broke her heart decades ago, played by Benjamin Bratt.
She also curated a collage featuring recent snapshots of Grier intertwined with glimpses of her childhood
Brooke‚Äôs daughter Grier has her mom‚Äôs modeling genes
The beaming mother first posted a nostalgic photo capturing her planting a kiss on her then-toddler daughter‚Äôs cheek
Following in her mother‚Äôs modeling path, Grier has recently stepped into the spotlight
The star shares Grier, along with daughter Rowan, 20, with her husband Chris Henchy
A family portrait with Brooke, Rowen, Chris and Grier
The 60-year-old actor even has a moment of full frontal nudity when Brooke‚Äôs character walks in on him naked.
Chad Michael Murray, 42, appears to be a romantic rival for Lana‚Äôs affection.
Also starring in the film are Rachael Harris (Suits), Michael McDonald (MADtv), Wilson Cruz (My So-Called Life), Tasneem Roc (The Bureau of Magical Things), and Dalip Sondhi (Frayed).
The movie was shot on location in Thailand for six weeks and will come out on Netflix May 9.
***

author: Caitlin Bassett The West Australian Comments
title: West Coast Fever wrapping their arms around star Jhaniele Fowler-Nembard after tragic pregnancy loss
text:
West Coast Fever star Jhaniele Fowler-Nembard has suffered the tragic loss of her unborn baby.
The club shared the devastating news on Friday along with a statement from general manager Sue Gaudion.
‚ÄúIt is with sadness and heartbreak that we inform the netball community that Jhaniele Fowler-Nembhard and her family have suffered the loss of their ‚ÄòBaby Fowler-Nembhard‚Äô,‚Äù Gaudion said.
‚ÄúEveryone at West Coast Fever is utterly devastated for Jhaniele, Ashani and Drehannah. We are wrapping our arms around them during this incredibly difficult time.
‚ÄúOur club will continue to support Jhaniele and her family through the days, weeks and months ahead as they navigate this heartbreaking situation.‚Äù
Fowler-Nembhard shared the news she was pregnant with her second child on social media in early December, which ruled the five-time league MVP out of the 2025 Super Netball season.
Later that month, the club announced the signing of former Vixen and Malawi International Mwai Kumwenda as a replacement player who had herself sat out of the 2024 season due to the pregnancy and birth of her first child.

title: Mania de Voc√™: Edmilson reclama de emprego no resort: "Humilha√ß√£o"
text: Mania de Voc√™: Edmilson reclama de emprego no resort: "Humilha√ß√£o" Malandro vai trabalhar como carregador de malas no Albacoa Por Reda√ß√£o NT Publicado em 30/11/2024 √†s 09:37 Nos pr√≥ximos cap√≠tulos de Mania de Voc√™, Edmilson (√ârico Br√°s) ser√° obrigado pela fam√≠lia a trabalhar se n√£o quiser morrer de fome. Expulso de casa, o malandro consegue emprego como carregador de malas no Albacoa e fica revoltado, alega ser a maior humilha√ß√£o, mas acaba aceitando. O marido de Dhu (Ivy Souza) roubou o dinheiro da filha, que seria do neto, e come√ßou a pagar de rico no resort s√≥ para prejudicar a ex-mulher, cozinheira do Maresia. At√© Iarlei (Lucas Wickhaus) se virou contra o pai. O namorado de Bruna (Duda Batsow) t amb√©m est√° trabalhando no Albacoa . O recepcionista ser√° a favor que o malandro v√° embora de casa para que sua m√£e volte. A fam√≠lia ainda deixa claro que se o safado n√£o arrumar emprego vai morrer de fome. Com pena do sogro, a filha de Hugo (Danilo Grangheia) pede ao pai que consiga um trabalho pra ela no resort. Edmilson ser√° contratado como carregador de malas e reclama, mas acaba cedendo √† press√£o da fam√≠lia. Saiba mais! Em Mania de Voc√™, Bruno arruma emprego para pai de Iarlei Nos pr√≥ximos cap√≠tulos de Mania de Voc√™ , Edmilson ser√° escorra√ßado de casa e ter√° que trabalhar se n√£o quiser morrer de fome. Com pensa do sogro, Bruna pede ao pai que ajude o malandro e Hugo o coloca para carregar malas no resort. Cansada de sustentar a fam√≠lia e n√£o ser reconhecida por isso, Dhu sai de casa, passando a morar no alojamento para os funcion√°rios do Albacoa. A cozinheira, por√©m, diz que volta a morar com os filhos e o neto quando o safado sair. Nisso, Edmilson flagra a filha escondendo um dinheiro no ber√ßo do seu neto, rouba a grana e vai gastar no Maresia s√≥ para confrontar a ex-mulher. A essa altura, Iarlei tamb√©m est√° trabalhando no resort e fica ao lado da m√£e e contra seu pai. + Mania de Voc√™: Dhu se livra de encosto, se torna chef e assume crush S√≥ depois que Dhu confessar ao encostado que j√° at√© arrumou um novo namorado, se referindo a Wagner (Bruno Quixotte), √© que o pilantra aceita que seu casamento acabou. Expulso de casa pela fam√≠lia, Edmilson ser√° obrigado a trabalhar se n√£o quiser passar fome. "Voc√™s venceram, fam√≠lia vingativa, eu me ajoelho, eu me submeto a essa degrada√ß√£o", dramatiza. Com pena do futuro sogro, Bruna pede a Hugo que consiga algo para ele fazer no Albacoa. "Ent√£o, Edmilson, o Iarlei me falou que voc√™ tava interessado num emprego aqui no resort... Voc√™ teve sorte! Abriu uma vaga esses dias pra carregador de malas", conta o gerente. "Voc√™ vai ficar na portaria e, quando os h√≥spedes chegarem com bagagem, voc√™ vai pegar e levar, na m√£o, se for pouca mala, ou no carrinho, se for muita mala, at√© o quarto deles", explica o marido de Diana (Vanessa Bueno). O malandro fala para si que n√£o nasceu pra isso, mas para a sua sorte Hugo n√£o o escuta. "Muito obrigado, seu Hugo, meu pai vai adorar esse trabalho. Ele √© forte, nasceu pra esse tipo de servi√ßo. Al√©m de ser simp√°tico, comunicativo... Ele vai ser um √≥timo cart√£o de visitas pro hotel", fala Iarlei. + Mania de Voc√™: F√°tima fica plantada em restaurante a espera de admirador Quando estiver sozinho com o filho, Edmilson amea√ßa desistir do trabalho. "Minha m√£e n√£o me criou com talquinho cheiroso pra eu ficar carregando mala de bacana. Isso √© muita humilha√ß√£o, isso eu n√£o admito, eu tenho honra, eu tenho dignidade!", dispara. O recepcionista perde a paci√™ncia e diz achar melhor mesmo que ele nem comece no emprego, pois vai acabar prejudicando ele e sua m√£e tamb√©m. "Depois, n√£o reclama que o senhor n√£o vai ver mais um centavo da gente", avisa o namorado de Bruna. A press√£o ser√° tanta que malandro acaba recuando. A cena est√° prevista para ir ao ar no cap√≠tulo do dia 14 de dezembro. O NaTelinha divulga todos os dias os resumos dos cap√≠tulos , detalhes dos personagens, entrevistas exclusivas com o elenco e spoiler da novela Mania de Voc√™. Assista ao resumo semanal de Mania de Voc√™: Tudo sobre a novela

author: @keycnewsnow
title: FIRST ALERT: Ice and snow to impact early weekend travel
text:
FIRST ALERT: Ice and snow to impact early weekend travel
Icy roads and surfaces likely tonight through Saturday
We are tracking a winter storm system that will bring light snow, light freezing rain/drizzle and sleet to much of our region this evening through Saturday. Overall precipitation won‚Äôt be heavy but will be enough to create slippery roads and surfaces, creating hazardous travel conditions across much of southern Minnesota and northern Iowa. Sleet and snow accumulation will generally be around or less than an inch with around a tenth of an inch or less of ice accumulation possible. A winter weather advisory is in effect for much of central and southern Minnesota and much of the state of Iowa from this evening through much of Saturday. If you must travel, be prepared for very icy roads. Stay tuned for updates. The KEYC First Alert Weather Team will be watching the system closely and will be here with local weather updates on the app, KEYC.com and on KEYC WeatherNow channel 12.4 as things develop.
DETAILS BELOW:
Latest Watches, Warnings and Advisories
A winter storm system will move from the Rockies and across southern Iowa tonight into Saturday, bringing a mix of snow, sleet and freezing rain/drizzle that will make travel difficult Friday night through much of Saturday. There isn‚Äôt a lot of moisture with this system. In fact, if all of the precipitation were to come in the form of snow, we‚Äôd be looking at around an inch, maybe up to 2 in a few spots. The challenge is warm air getting pulled into the middle layers of the atmosphere. This will make things a bit messy as we transition from sleet to snow to freezing rain and drizzle. A Winter Weather Advisory is in effect for central and southern Minnesota and northern Iowa from Friday evening through much of Saturday. The advisory is along and south of a line from the northern Twin Cities metro to Marshall. In the Mankato/North Mankato area, the Winter Weather Advisory is in effect from 9pm Friday evening through noon Saturday. You can find times and information for your specific location on the KEYC First Alert Weather app and at KEYC.com when you click the weather alerts banner toward the top of the page.
TIMING:
Areas of sleet and snow will develop and move from southwest to northeast across our region this evening. In the Mankato/North Mankato area, areas of sleet and snow will arrive by mid to late evening. Arrival times will be earlier southwest of Mankato and a bit later to the north and east. Areas of light snow and freezing drizzle will continue through late tonight with light snow and freezing rain and/or drizzle likely from late tonight through much of the day Saturday.
PRECIPITATION AMOUNTS:
As I mentioned earlier, this is not a high-precipitation winter weather event. We‚Äôre only expecting around one to two tenths of an inch of moisture, which will likely end up being around an inch or less of sleet and snow with less than a tenth of an inch of ice. Ice amounts could be slightly higher further south where it is warmer. Snow and sleet amounts could be slightly higher with ice amounts being lower further north where it is colder.
IMPACT:
Roads and sidewalks will become icy and very slippery by mid to late Friday evening with icy conditions and hazardous travel conditions continuing through at least midday Saturday. Travel conditions will gradually improve Saturday afternoon into Saturday evening.
EXTENDED FORECAST:
Sunday will be mostly cloudy but warmer with highs in the mid to upper 30s. We are watching another system that will have the potential to bring some light rain and snow on Monday afternoon into Monday night. After that, colder Canadian air will move into the region, keeping temperatures in the low to mid 20s through most of next week. Unfortunately, the chance of a white Christmas‚Äîbeyond what we have now‚Äîisn‚Äôt looking great. But there is still hope. Christmas is still over 10 days away, and a lot can happen between now and then.
[Click here to download the KEYC News Now app or our KEYC First Alert weather app.](https://www.keyc.com/page/keyc-apps-for-ios-and-android-devices/)

author: Jesse Holland
title: Mike Perry suspended following Jake Paul loss in Tampa - MMAmania.com
text: Florida Athletic Commission (FAC) recently released its medical suspensions for [the ‚ÄúFear No Man‚Äù pay-per-view (PPV) event](https://www.mmamania.com/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-date-start-time-full-results-dazn-boxing), which took place last Sat. night (July 20, 2024) at Amalie Arena in Tampa. BKFC brawler Mike Perry was suspended 60 days for [his technical knockout loss to Jake Paul](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/21/24202521/full-fight-video-highlights-jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-fear-no-man-results-dazn-ppv-boxing-knockout), while Ashton Sylve drew a 90-day sit for [getting slumped by Lucas Bahdi](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/20/24202526/knockout-of-the-year-lucas-bahdi-sleeps-ashton-sylve-with-absolutely-vicious-combination-highlights). That‚Äôs according to [MMA Junkie](https://mmajunkie.usatoday.com/lists/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-medical-suspensions). In addition, Stevie Morgan will spend 60 days on the shelf for [her lopsided loss](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/21/24202828/highlights-savage-amanda-serrano-steamrolls-stevie-morgan-first-knockout-win-since-2021-fear-no-man) to women‚Äôs champion Amanda Serrano, while Dane Guerrero gets a two-month vacation for [his defeat to Ariel Perez](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/20/24200900/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-results-live-streaming-fight-updates-fear-no-man-boxing-dazn). All other fighters competing last weekend for Most Valuable Promotions (MVP) in ‚ÄúThe Sunshine State‚Äù ‚Äî including ‚Äú [El Gallo](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/16/24199875/child-no-more-mature-jake-paul-debuts-new-nickname-ahead-mike-perry-fight-tampa-boxing)‚Äù ‚Äî have been cleared to return to active competition. ‚ÄúChopped it up with Mike Perry last night,‚Äù Paul wrote on ‚ÄúAppreciate ya dude, respect,‚Äù [Perry responded](https://x.com/PlatinumPerry/status/1816491947017855226). For complete ‚ÄúFear No Man‚Äù results and play-by-play click [here](https://www.mmamania.com/2024/7/20/24200900/jake-paul-vs-mike-perry-results-live-streaming-fight-updates-fear-no-man-boxing-dazn). Get the latest gear [](https://fanatics.93n6tx.net/c/482924/586570/9663?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.fanatics.com%2Fboxing%2Fmike-tyson%2Fmike-tyson-fanatics-authentic-autographed-red-everlast-boxing-glove%2Fo-47%2Bt-23347562%2Bp-454259416257%2Bz-9-933971910%3F_ref%3Dp-SRP%3Am-GRID%3Ai-r0c0%3Apo-0)
